name: Hired Guards
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

spells.name: Electrified Weapons
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Piercing Assault once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Mind Shackler
spells.effect: Pick one enemy model within 24", which takes 1 hit with AP(4).

spells.name: Fortified Dome
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Guardian Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Poison Gas
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 6", which take 3 hits with Purge each.

spells.name: Deadly Attraction
spells.effect: Pick up to six enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Quick Shot against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (this._skirmish ? 1 : this.AuraSize), avgUnit: true }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Flame Blast
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 18", which take 1 hit with Blast(3) each.

specialRules.name: Piercing Target
specialRules.description: Once per game, during this model's activation, pick one enemy unit within 36" and in line of sight of it, and place X markers on it. Friendly units get +AP(X) when attacking it.

specialRules.name: Stealth Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Stealth. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Guardian
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot or charged from over 9" away and take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Fast Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game moves +2" when using Advance actions and +4" when using Rush/Charge actions. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Piercing Hunter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Piercing Hunter. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Tear
specialRules.description: Against non-Hero units with Tough(3) or more, this weapon gets AP(+4).

specialRules.name: Quick Shot Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Quick Shot against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Shred in Melee Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Shred in melee. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Guardian Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Guardian Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Stealth
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot from over 9" away, enemy units get -1 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Piercing Hunter
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, its weapons get AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Tough
specialRules.description: This model only rolls to check wound effects once it has taken at least X wounds, and is only Knocked Out on rolls of 5+X or more.

specialRules.name: Quick
specialRules.description: Moves +2" when using Advance, and +2 when using Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Quick Shot
specialRules.description: This model may shoot after using Rush actions.

specialRules.name: Shred
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Guardian Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Guardian, enemy hits always count as having AP(-1) from Guardian (instead of only when being shot/charged from over 9" away).

specialRules.name: Piercing Assault
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+1) when charging.

specialRules.name: Purge
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and against units where most models have Defense 2+ to Defense 4+, this weapon gets AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Blast
specialRules.description: Ignores cover, and after resolving other special rules, each hit is multiplied by X, where X is up to as many hits as enemy models in the target unit and within 3 of it. Hits must be split evenly between all enemy units within 3 of any model from the target (defender picks how).
